title: OCE mod bots, take note

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: This encapsulates in a nutshell why the swear detection bot is inappropriate for OCE.

replies.body:
nice un ol'cobber, 'em tall poppy blimeys up back of bourke, reckon us lot are just anklebiters and don't get when a bastard is just trying to be a bit of a mug with the mates.
'em drongos better have a good ol' fossick through the dobbers 'cause this cactus bot gonna make 'em look like a right bunch of gallahs.

> [{quoted}](name=Nightjar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cEAoMq5P,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-12-10T02:58:42.822+0000)
>
> nice un ol'cobber, 'em tall poppy blimeys up back of bourke, reckon us lot are just anklebiters and don't get when a bastard is just trying to be a bit of a mug with the mates.
> 'em drongos better have a good ol' fossick through the dobbers 'cause this cactus bot gonna make 'em look like a right bunch of gallahs.

Who the hell do you think you are?  Alf Stewart?

haha well it was quite overplayed wasn't it? If I heard a regular person go up to me and say this I would also need a moment to comprehend what I had just heard. That said, my dad's friend really did speak like this when he came over from coober pedy.

if someone calls me mate shits about to go down, but if someone calls me cu*nt i am considered their mate

cause straya cu*nts

Good onya, c*nt! Nice to see that Lewis Spears isn't the only one concerned about how Aussie culture can be misinterpreted by "outsiders".

Now that it's been brought up, I wouldn't mind myself a good ol' Gaytime for myself tonight (unfortunately, the bloke next door doesn't sell them).

nah f that c. give us a gaytime
cheers c

Nah, c*nt, why not both?

Seriously, just have the noodles first then the Gaytime, and be sure to bring a friend! It's no good without a friend.
Aussie's XD, Proud to be one :D
